Typealiases.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK11VGSJSO.name: VGSJSONData
Typealiases.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK11VGSJSO.abstract: Key-value data type, usually used for response format.

Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/s:.name: isNetworkDebugEnabled
Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to record VGSShowSDK network session with success/failed requests. Default is false.

Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/s:.name: isExtensiveDebugEnabled
Structs/VGSLoggingConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to enable extensive debugging. Default is false.

Structs/VGSTextRange.html.abstract: An object representing text range with closed boundaries.

Protocols/VGSPDFViewDelegate.html#/c:@M@.name: documentDidChange(in:)
Protocols/VGSPDFViewDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Tells the delegate the document was displayed in view.

Protocols/VGSPDFViewDelegate.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Tells the delegate when pdf view encounters an error.

Protocols/VGSImageViewDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Tells the delegate when image view encounters an error.

Enums/VGSErrorType.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.name: unexpectedResponseDataFormat

Classes/VGSPDFView.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.name: displayAsBook
Classes/VGSPDFView.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.abstract: A Boolean value determines whether the view will display the first page as a book cover (meaningful only when the document is in two-up or two-up continuous display mode).

Classes/VGSPDFView.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.name: pdfBackgroundColor
Classes/VGSPDFView.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.abstract: Background color of pdf viewer. Default is gray with 50% opacity.

Classes/VGSPDFView.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.name: hasDocument
Classes/VGSPDFView.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK1.abstract: A Boolean value determines whether the view has document.

Classes/VGSLabel.html#/s:10VGSShowSDK8VG.abstract: UIEdgeInsets for placeholder. Default is nil. If placeholder paddings not set, paddings property will be used to control placeholder insets. IMPORTANT! Paddings should be non-negative.

Classes/VGSShow.html.name: VGSShow
Classes/VGSShow.html.abstract: An object you use for revealing and displaying data in corresponding subscribed VGS Show SDK views.

Classes/VGSShowError.html.name: VGSShowError
Classes/VGSShowError.html.abstract: An error produced by VGSShowSDK. Works similar to default NSError in iOS.

Classes/VGSImageView.html.name: VGSImageView
Classes/VGSImageView.html.abstract: An object that displays revealed image data.

Classes/VGSLabel.html.name: VGSLabel
Classes/VGSLabel.html.abstract: A view that displays revealed text data.

Classes/VGSPDFView.html.name: VGSPDFView
Classes/VGSPDFView.html.abstract: An object that displays revealed pdf data.

Classes/VGSLogger.html.abstract: VGSLogger encapsulates logging logic and debugging options for VGSShowSDK. Use .configuration property to setup these options.

Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
